uvi.description:
scsi: advansys: Fix kernel pointer leak

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v4.4.293 by commit 06d7d12efb5c62db9dea15141ae2b322c2719515. For more details please see the references link.
